# AddControl

**Instance Method**

Adds a control to the clock device.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t AddControl(IOUserAudioControl * in_control);
```

## Parameters

- **in_control**: The [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioControl] to add to the clock device.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] on success, or another value if an error occurs. For a list of error codes, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/error-codes].

## Discussion

If adding the control succeeds, the control’s reference count increments by one.

## Managing Audio Controls

- **RemoveControl**: Removes a control from the clock device.
- **IOUserAudioControl**: The base class for audio control objects.
